seg.project.checkers

Class CheckersServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • seg.project.checkers.CheckersServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CheckersServer
extends AbstractServer
    This is the server the checkers game will use

    • Field Summary

      static int DEFAULT_PORT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckersServer()
      Default constructor, this is just CheckersServer(DEFAULT_PORT)
      CheckersServer(int port)
      The constructor for creating a server and it will automatically start listening

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isGameMode()
      If the server has stopped listening and is in a game it will return true
      void killServer()
      Function for ending the server
      boolean setToGameMode(java.lang.String client)
      One time function to set the server to game mode, it drops all the connections except for the supplied client

      • CheckersServer

        public CheckersServer(int port)
               throws java.io.IOException
        The constructor for creating a server and it will automatically start listening
        Parameters:
        port - the port to host on
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the start up failed, this will be thrown

      • CheckersServer

               throws java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • isGameMode

        public boolean isGameMode()
        If the server has stopped listening and is in a game it will return true
        Returns:
        If a game has started

      • setToGameMode

        public boolean setToGameMode(java.lang.String client)
        One time function to set the server to game mode, it drops all the connections except for the supplied client
        Parameters:
        client - The client to keep
        Returns:
        If it was successfully changed
